{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the information provided in the relevant documents, ABCG2 is described as a membrane protein and a member of the ATP-binding cassette (ABC) transporter superfamily. It is involved in xenobiotic and endobiotic transport in key pharmacological barriers and drug metabolizing organs.
